Playerdise Marketing

Challenge your friends and win cash prizes while playing your favorite games.

Playerdise Competitive Gaming Platform is coming in Summer of 2022

Grand Opening Competition!

Leading up to our grand opening, we will be conducting a competition for the most points scored in a game of NBA2k20, NBA2k21, or NBA2k22.

Instructions

Simply submit a screenshot of your winning score to Twitter @playerdisegames. All entries must be submitted on Twitter by the end of the NBA regular season on April 10, 2022. The top 3 scores will be awarded a credit of $300, $200, and $100 respectively into their Playerdise account. In the event of a tie, the user with the largest point differential in their victory will be deemed the winner. If there is still a tie, the user who submitted their screenshot first will be deemed the winner. No purchase necessary, limited to those 18 or older.

**This credit must be used on Playerdise and can't be withdrawn until those funds have been played through at least once on the platform. No cost to enter, contest open to all. Prohibited in Arizona, Arkansas, Iowa, Louisiana, Maryland, Michigan, Montana, Nevada, South Carolina, Tennessee, and Washington. Participants must not be a resident of one of those states and at least 18 years old. One entry per person.

Cash Prizes

You think you're the best? Prove it. No excuses here! You pick the console, set your customized playing style, and determine the payout structure to win cash prizes playing your favorite games. This platform has something for every gamer, so it's time to get in on the action!

Proposition Challenges

Call out that gamer who is talking smack! Have them put their money where their mouth is. Think you can shut out your opponent in Madden at 5 to 1 odds? Or get the most headshots in a game of Halo? Here is your chance... to some, that's more important.

Heavenly Pennies Prize

To win the Heavenly Pennies Prize Pool, it takes complete domination! To win this progressive prize pool, it will take consistent performance and skill, as other users try to knock you down a peg and destroy your win streak. Choose your matches wisely, or it will be streak-over-for-you! Don't fret if you can't win this top prize, just being active on the site and completing 3 easy steps makes you eligible to win a share of this prize pool!

Heavenly Pennies Prize

Dice Game

Win BIG discounts with our dice game! After every 7 games you'll get to roll the dice for a chance to win discounts ranging from 20% off to a no fee game if you can roll any double number!

Dice Game

Bounty Rewards

If you find yourself on a winning streak you better watch out because Playerdise will provide a cash reward to see you defeated! The longer the win streak you're on, the bigger the reward for whoever defeats you!
